title: Can anyone help me find the list of usable symbols for NA?  Need for planning a Club tag.
body:
Title.  Any help would be appreciated =)

 {{champion:150}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: I believe the clubs use the same region based special characters  per the[ name guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ).  It may not be possible to use a whole lot on NA.
Thank you Porocles, is there a reason why other symbols I've seen that work (^.!=) ect are not listed?
It's kind of the wild wild west with naming conventions for clubs names currently.  We haven't updated the list to reflect options for club names, but it may be worth looking into.
